description:
This module allows students to explore current musical activities across the spectrum of categories. By the end of the course, students should have an understanding of the current state of music in society, ranging from how and where it is taking place, the musical education and government systems involved, influences and trends across the industry, activities in pop and traditional music, and more.

In addition to regular lectures and student-led discussions on relevant topics, students will have hands-on music making tutorials that relate to musical activities in Singapore, as well as preparing student group presentations on current affairs in music.
title: State of the Art: A Current View of Music in Singapore
